resources.string: The purpose of this app is to notify a friend that you\'re almost at their location when you\'re giving them a ride. This is used to prevent that situation where you\'re sitting outside their house for 10 minutes waiting for them to come outside. \nHow it works: Select a contact by clicking the button below. If you have an address in your contacts book for the selected contact, then an "alert" will be set up and the contact will get a text message when you\'re \"x\" miles from their address. If you don\'t have an address for that contact, then you have the option have a text message sent to the contact asking for his/her address. When the contact responds with an address, the alert will automatically be set up and he/she will receive a text message as expected when you\'re \"x\" miles away.
Describe the application here. Put an email address for contacting?
